BoxLocalization.Label: Derived column
BoxLocalization.Hint: Defines column derived from column(s) of a table and its parameters

Action.Name: TestColumnSelectExpression
Action.Label: Test formula
Action.Hint: This will test formula expression validity.

Socket.Name: DataMatrix
Socket.Label: Data matrix
Socket.Hint: Defines source data matrix for derived column

Socket.Name: ValueVariability
Socket.Label: Variability
Socket.Hint: Variability of values in the column.

Socket.Name: ValueStandardDeviation
Socket.Label: Standard deviation
Socket.Hint: Average deviation of values in the column.

Socket.Name: ValueDistincts
Socket.Label: Distinct values
Socket.Hint: Number of distinct values in the column.

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: Attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Categorizes the column thus creating new attribute box.

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: EachValueOneCategoryAttribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Each value one category attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Each value of the column becomes one category

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: EquidistantIntervalsAttribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Equidistant intervals attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Intervals of the same length; parameters are starting value and length of intervals

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: EquifrequencyIntervalsAttribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Equifrequency intervals attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: There will be nearly the same number objects in each interval; parameter is number of intervals in which you want divide objects

Phrase.PhraseText: Test of the derived column formula
Specified derived column formula expression is correct.
Specified derived column formula expression is not correct!
